power.title: Bend Space
power.fluff: You close the distance between an ally and his or her enemies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target's reach increases by 1, and the target adds your Wisdom modifier to the range of his or her ranged powers.

power.title: Close Wounds
power.fluff: Flesh knits, wounds stanch, and strength returns... for a time

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to 6 + your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 10 + your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Dimension Swap
power.fluff: You fold the space between yourself and an ally so that you can switch positions

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and one ally you can see in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The targets teleport into each other's previous space.

power.title: Dull the Pain
power.fluff: You respond to an enemy's attack by dampening your ally's ability to feel pain

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally within 5 squares of you takes damage

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains resist all against the triggering damage. The resist equals your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: The resist equals 4 + your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: The resist equals 8 + your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Healing Bond
power.fluff: You strengthen the bond between two allies, so that when one prospers, they both benefit

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally within 5 squares of you spends a healing surge

section.name: Target:
section.target: one ally in the burst other than the triggering ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target regains hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

power.title: Mind over Matter
power.fluff: You convince an ally that the wounds he or she suffers are not as bad as they seem

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains temporary hit points equal to one-half his or her healing surge value. If the target is bloodied, he or she instead gains temporary hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

power.title: Psionic Charge
power.fluff: When your ally springs into motion, you channel psionic power to lend him or her additional strength and speed

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of his or her next turn, the target gains the following benefits when charging:
+2 power bonus to speed.
A power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Constitution modifier.
A power bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by the charge equal to your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Psionic Conduit
power.fluff: You lend psionic power to an ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You transfer 1 or 2 of your power points to the target.

power.title: Sympathetic Agony
power.fluff: You open your mind to receive an ally's agony, and take some of that pain upon yourself

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally you can see in the burst takes damage from an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target ally takes half damage from the triggering attack, and you take the rest. If the target ally would receive an effect that a save can end from the triggering attack, you can choose to have the effect apply to you instead.
Until the start of the acting creature's next turn, you and the target ally gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses while you are within 5 squares of one another.

power.title: Wellspring of Vigor
power.fluff: By shutting his or her ability to feel pain, you ensure that your ally can keep going when others might falter

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target starts his or her turn and is not bloodied, he or she gains temporary hit points equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier.
